programme.desc: Drama clubs from an all-boys and all-girls high school hold a joint training camp. A series of horrific and ususual events soon take place at the camp and the students learn that an old mountain legend creature, Dorome, is responsible.

programme.title: In Cycle
programme.desc: A seemingly happy couple who loves diving come to a deserted island for a diving vacation, which is part of the husband’s plan to murder his wife. His conspiracy however, is intervened by a series of bizarre events on the island. Can the couple eventually escape from the enigmatic ocean?

programme.title: Beast Mode
programme.desc: A Hollywood director accidentally kills his leading actor and has to find an exact duplicate to proceed with the filming. To do that, he must agree to an evil pact which unleashes a band of bloodthirsty, shape-shifting, ferocious beasts onto L.A….

programme.title: Watch Me Kill
programme.desc: A ruthless assassin named Luciana is hired by a kingpin to murder a man with a valuable diamond. Complications ensue when Luciana stumbles upon a teenage girl who is held captive by the man, and the kingpin discovers that the diamond Luciana turned over is fake.

programme.title: The Fox Demon Love
programme.desc: Adapted from a story in the novel “Strange Tales from Liaozhai”, a young student in the late Ming Dynasty meets a charming fox demon and they soon fall in love. Though they encounter several obstacles due to their different nature, the lovers continue to fight against fate. Can they finally be together?

programme.title: Babang Luksa
programme.desc: One year after Carlos’ girlfriend Beatrice died, his new love Anna starts to experience horrifying events. Through a spiritualist, Anna knows that she is the reason for Beatrice’s suicide, which leads to the return of her angry spirit to seek revenge. As Anna’s friends begin to die mysteriously one by one, will she be the next victim?

programme.title: In Cycle

His conspiracy however, is intervened by a series of bizarre events on the island. Can the couple eventually escape from the enigmatic ocean?

programme.title: Lumuhod Ka Sa Lupa: Ang Bagong Yugto
Lumuhod Ka Sa Lupa: Ang Bagong Yugto
In Touch with Dr. Charles Stanley
The Witch: Part 2 The Other One
programme.desc: A mysterious girl survived a blood raid in a secret lab found herself being tracked down by a group of assassins.

programme.title: Unforgettable
programme.desc: A radio DJ receives a letter written 23 years ago. Through the letter, the story of his first love and friendships of five friends are revealed.

programme.title: Deadman
programme.desc: An ace in the barge business makes money by selling his name, is falsely accused of embezzling billions. He fights to reclaim his stolen life from those tied to him solely by name.

programme.title: The Divine Move
programme.desc: Go player Tae-Seok is framed and imprisoned for his brother's death after losing a high-stakes game. After his sentence, he sets out for revenge against the underground gambler who destroyed his life.

programme.title: Beasts Clawing At Straws
programme.desc: Driven by their own desperate desires, the destinies of 8 down-on-their-luck individuals slowly converge and come crashing down while chasing after a mysterious money bag.

programme.title: Forbidden Dream
programme.desc: Two Korean inventors develop a 20-year relationship while advancing the field of astronomy.

programme.title: Villain And Widow
programme.desc: Widow Yeon-ju rents out the second floor of her home to a novelist. The neighbors suspect the novelist’s true identity as he spends an inordinate time whenever he's left home alone….

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: When an Olympic gold medalist boxer met a young boxer who falls victim to match fixing, he vows to start a boxing team at the school he teaches at and give his student a shot at the nationals.

programme.title: Race To Freedom: Um Bok Dong
programme.desc: K-pop star Rain portrays Um Bok-dong, an unlikely hero in a government-organized bicycle race during the Japanese colonial era. Defeating Japanese rivals, his victories inspire locals and resistance fighters.

programme.title: Concrete Utopia
programme.desc: Seoul has laid in ruin after an earthquake, leaving one single apartment remains standing. The apartment's resident representative strives to protect residents from outsiders...

programme.title: The Beast
programme.desc: Two rival detectives compete against each other to catch the notorious killer who shakes up Korea by their gruesome murders.

programme.title: The Lost Choices
programme.desc: A young woman who has speech disorder is raped while on her way home. The police do not believe in her. She is frustrated and thus triggers her silent revenge against the world.

programme.title: We Are Brothers
programme.desc: Two brothers separated at birth reunite 30 years later and go on a road trip in search of their mom with Alzheimer's.

programme.title: Noryang: Deadly Sea
programme.desc: In the last battle of Yi Sun-Sin in 1598, he fought against the Japanese army and intertwined with the Ming dynasty, bringing the 7-year Japanese invasions of Korea to an end...

programme.title: Lucky Chan-Sil
programme.desc: When a film producer suddenly loses her job, she moves into a bargain room in a rundown neighborhood where she meets an assortment of characters that inspire her in different ways.

programme.title: Steal My Heart
programme.desc: Hot-shot police detective Lee is out to get a hit-and-run driver and discovers the driver is his long-lost girlfriend from ten years ago. He tries to protect her before her crime record accumulates.

programme.title: The Tiger
programme.desc: While the Kingdom of Korea is under occupation by the Japanese, an old and experienced hunter is challenged by the hunt of the last tiger in the country.

programme.title: Architecture 101
programme.desc: An architect gets an unexpected visit by his first love whom he hasn't seen in many years, bringing back all the memories from when they first met 15 years ago.

programme.title: The Face Reader
programme.desc: Nae-gyeong is the most skillful face reader in all of Joeson dynasty. After his abilities are acknowledged, he gets pulled into a royal power struggle involving the King's successor.

programme.title: The Odd Family: Zombie On Sale
programme.desc: When a pharmaceutical company's illegal experiments inadvertently create a zombie, the quirky Park family discovers an interesting side effect to the virus and tries to profit from it.

programme.title: Welcome To Waikiki 2 Ep13
programme.desc: Actor Lee Joon-ki ropes two longtime friends into investing in the Seoul guesthouse he runs on the side, where their old crush from school comes to stay.

programme.title: Welcome To Waikiki 2 Ep14
programme.desc: Actor Lee Joon-ki ropes two longtime friends into investing in the Seoul guesthouse he runs on the side, where their old crush from school comes to stay.

programme.title: Handsome Guys
programme.desc: Self-proclaimed tough guy Jae-Pil and sexy guy Sang-Gu move to a countryside home. A spirit sealed in the basement awakens, leading to a high-stimulus chilling comedy they'll never forget.

programme.title: Honest Candidate 2
programme.desc: Joo Sang-sook, who failed to win the Seoul mayoral election by dropping the truth bomb on national television, is suddenly pulled into the spotlight again after rescuing a young man from drowning.

programme.title: Following
programme.desc: A man's obsession with spying on people comes back to hunt him when he begins to stalk a mysterious instagram star.

programme.title: Villain And Widow
programme.desc: Widow Yeon-ju rents out the second floor of her home to a novelist. The neighbors suspect the novelist’s true identity as he spends an inordinate time whenever he's left home alone….

programme.title: Parasite
programme.desc: An unstoppable string of mishaps awaits when greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

programme.title: Mr. Zoo: The Missing Vip
programme.desc: After discovering he can suddenly talk to animals, an intelligence agent partners with a canine pal to handle a case that has gone sideways.

programme.title: The Moon
programme.desc: An astronaut is left stranded in space because of an accident during a spaceflight. The former director of the space centre strives to bring him home safely...

programme.title: Miss Baek
programme.desc: A woman finds it difficult to shake off her ex-convict label, until she meets a girl whom she is determined to save.

programme.title: Sori: Voice From The Heart
programme.desc: A father searching for his missing daughter finds a satellite that remembers sounds from across the world. Using his daughter's voice as a beacon, the satellite helps him track her down.

programme.title: Innocence
programme.desc: A hotshot lawyer uncovers the conspiracy of a small village while defending her estranged mother, who has Alzheimer's disease and accused of killing the attendees at her husband’s funeral.

programme.title: Concrete Utopia

programme.title: Bear Man
programme.desc: Two bears from the Institute of techonolgy have turned into humans after eating garlic and mugwort. Yet, one has grown up into a police, while one has become a gangster...

programme.title: The Whistleblower
programme.desc: Based on the true story of a disgraced Korean researcher who claims to have successfully cloned human embryo stem cells. However, the results were revealed to be fabricated along with other unethical practices later.

programme.desc: More information pours in about victims from the past and how they tie to the murders of the present. Lt. Cooper (MALCOM-JAMAL WARNER) and Amy Sykes get caught in a gun fight.

programme.title: Wahl Street S2 5
programme.desc: After returning from Boston for his 50th birthday, Mark makes a decision about his future with Flecha Azul tequila.

programme.title: Wahl Street S2 6
programme.desc: Mark flies to New York to take F45 public and solidifies a new partnership in Vegas for Wahlburgers, while his wife Rhea helps launch Municipal’s new women’s line in Los Angeles.

programme.title: Wahl Street S2 7
programme.desc: After flying to Ohio to check on his car dealership – and burgeoning RV and Airstream business – Mark prepares to test his faith-based film in front of an audience for the first time.

programme.title: Wahl Street S2 8
programme.desc: Mark rallies Flecha Azul's marketing team ahead of their big launch, shores up a deal to expand Wahlburgers.

programme.title: Wahl Street S2 9
programme.desc: While screening his new film in Iowa, Mark gets caught in a tornado. Later, Mark is informed about a glitch on Municipal’s website during their women’s line launch.

programme.desc: Georgie \u0026 Mandy's First Marriage S1 14.

programme.title: My Sister's Keeper
programme.desc: Anna Fitzgerald looks to earn medical emancipation from her parents who until now have relied on their youngest child to help their leukemia-stricken daughter Kate remain alive.

programme.desc: Get the behind-the-scenes scoop on your favorite hacks! Was basketball created from a hack? Which baller did Brooke have a crush on? And which explosive hack gave Brooke nightmares? Get the lowdown from Inside Hacks!

programme.title: Friends S5 7
programme.desc: After getting kicked out of his apartment, Ross moves in temporarily with Chandler and Joey, driving all three of them crazy.

programme.title: Friends S5 8
programme.desc: It's Thanksgiving, and the gang remembers former terrible Thanksgiving experiences. Chandler tells Monica that he loves her.

programme.title: Friends S5 9
programme.desc: Ross becomes upset when someone at work takes his sandwich from the refrigerator and eats it. Joey finds himself in a terrible mess when he tries to cover for Chandler and Monica's dating.

programme.title: Friends S5 10
programme.desc: Phoebe collects money for the Salvation Army during the holidays. A bored Ross creates havoc in Joey and Chandler's lives. Rachel is disturbed by her date's inappropriate relationship with his sister.

programme.title: Friends S5 11
programme.desc: The friends all make New Year's resolutions, but it looks like Rachel's resolution – to stop gossiping – is going to be the hardest to keep when she finds out about Chandler and Monica's dating.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 8
programme.desc: In one of the most unusual big money auctions yet, Sean auctions the contents of abandoned big-rigs. Scott and Jesse go head to head over a space age haul, while Brandon and Lori take a chance on a battle-ready rig. Meanwhile, Papa Bear goes all in for some vintage fun stuff - and he isn't in the mood to play games.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 9
programme.desc: It's wheels up for Papa Bear when he takes a gamble on a mysterious covered item. Meanwhile, the newcomer Alvarado brothers find an unusual collectible hiding in plain sight -- but are they going to flush their money down the toilet? And Brandon andLori find out whether a pet bin will turn out to be their best friend.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 10
programme.desc: Does Big Bear mean Big Money? The Alvarados get sneaky while Desert Dan horses around, and frustration gets the best of Brandori. Do they strike gold or strike out? As Jesse crushes dreams, who will go home empty-handed?

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 11
programme.desc: Brandon goes out on a limb, and finds himself sinking in quicksand with no help from Lori - will Desert Dan lend him a hand? Dan's car smarts come in handy, while T Money rocks out with his win. Will Scott and Chrissy climb to the top, or fall hard in today's auction?

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 12
programme.desc: Scott blows his wad on an Oktoberfest bin, and will have to drown his sorrows. The Alvarado Brothers bid big on collectibles -- will they draw a wild card? T Money rides away with a big win, while Brandon and Lori investigate a crime scene bin. Willeveryone make it out of the auction alive?

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S11 8
programme.desc: Leonard and Howard enlist Barry Kripke (JOHN ROSS BOWIE) to help after they learn Sheldon betrayed them by working with the military behind their backs.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S11 9
programme.desc: Sheldon tries to teach the guys a lesson after they cut him out of a potentially valuable Bitcoin investment; a seven-year-old video reveals a secret about Leonard and Penny's relationship.

programme.desc: A gang of extreme jumpers nets the Direstas a commissioned Harley-inspired pogo stick sale.

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: A new S.W.A.T. team must transport a drug kingpin who offers $100 million to anyone who can free him. Inspired by the �70s hit TV series, S.W.A.T. stars Colin Farrell as Jim Street, a former S.W.A.T. team member demoted in the aftermath of a controversial decision made during a robbery/hostage standoff. He gets a chance to redeem himself when team commander Dan �Hondo� Harrelson (Samuel L. Jackson) is assigned to recruit and train five top-notch cops for a new Special Weapons and Tactics (S.W.A.T.) unit. Other team members include Deacon �Deke� Kaye (James Todd Smith aka LL Cool J), Chris Sanchez (Michelle Rodriguez) and Michael Boxer (Brian Van Holt). After weeks of demanding physical training, the new S.W.A.T. team is quickly thrown intoaction when a notorious drug lord (Olivier Martinez) offers a $100 million bounty to anyone who can free him from police custody.
